feed.title: Voltaserve Releases

entry.title: New release for Voltaserve: v3.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(misc): add Murph .env file by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/595
  • fix(idp): add Deno permissions to Dockerfile by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/596

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/compare/v3.1.0...v3.1.1
